name: Ekrem BAL
bio: Ekrem is a co-founder and the CSO at Chainway. Chainway introduced Proof of Innocence, showcased at proofofinnocence.com, which is a privacy-preserving mathematical compliance tool built on Tornado Cash. They developed Proof of Innocence atop RAILGUN and Privacy Pools. Currently, Chainway is now fully dedicated to building Bitcoinâ€™s First ZK Rollup
